commentBody:
oh no, Mr. Trump; if you lose you get all the credit.

if you lose it is your fault and your fault alone. all you had to do was listen to your advisers or the party or simply shut up and you'd have won this, but YOUR decision to be the unpredictable, chaos candidate in this election, as well as YOUR decision to align yourself with racists, sexists, homophobes, islamaphobes and xenophobes, is what cost you this race.

this is on you and your failed brand, Mr. Trump. The GOP could have won this with just about any candidate except you. but because your brand is now on the marquee, this is ALL ON YOU.

Own it, man.
